LanguageData.GoldenEye.label: golden eye
LanguageData.GoldenEye.description: Replaces missing eyes. So incredibly beautiful that it's a shame you can't see yourself in the mirror.
LanguageData.ArtificialNose.label: artificial nose
LanguageData.ArtificialNose.description: Replaces a missing nose. Covers the hole in the face.
LanguageData.HydraulicJaw.label: hydraulic jaw
LanguageData.HydraulicJaw.description: Replaces a missing jaw. Be careful with the extremely efficient teeth!
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.label: simple prosthetic hand
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.description: Replaces missing hands. Way more comfortable and less frightening than the hook hand.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.label: simple prosthetic foot
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.description: Replaces missing feet. Not as cheap as a wood log.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLeg.label: simple prosthetic leg
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLeg.description: Simple prosthesis made to replace missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticArm.label: simple prosthetic arm
LanguageData.ArtificialPelvis.label: artificial pelvis
LanguageData.ArtificialPelvis.description: Replaces a missing pelvis. Pretty useful if crawling is not your favourite kind of moving around.
